title: Travel Planner
text: Partnered with 4 other developers to create a trip search engine using 3 APIs

title: Password Generator
text: Created a means for users to generate random passwords with specified criteria

title: Day Planner with Weather Update
text: Used Moment.js, local storage, and a weather API to create a scheduling app

title: Employee Roster
